title: Crypto Library
author: Crypto Library
content: Today I was transferring some amount of btc from my trust wallet to another wallet, now it shows me this message. Actually, what is the problem with it? Can someone Please tell me the details

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: You're sending an amount that's smaller than the minimum, 546 sat to legacy addresses, or slightly less than that to Segwit.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: As mentioned above, you're trying to send a very small amount. Here's an article by Trustwallet explaining the error message and what you can do about it: https://community.trustwallet.com/t/unable-to-send-due-to-dust-error/1188

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on August 16, 2022, 03:39:06 PMYou're sending an amount that's smaller than the minimum, 546 sat to legacy addresses, or slightly less than that to Segwit.Oh! I can see my transaction hash in blockchair with transaction status Confirm 2 of 6 confirmations . Thanks for the info

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto Library on August 16, 2022, 03:45:17 PMI can see my transaction hash in blockchair with transaction status Confirm 2 of 6 confirmations .Did you make a larger transaction, or was the error incorrect?

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: no, it's about 0.0021 BTC. Now the transaction status is showing Confirmed 6 confirmations, still, the problem is showing. I don't understand what to do

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto Library on August 16, 2022, 04:02:47 PMstill, the problem is showing.Is switching to a better wallet an option?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto Library on August 16, 2022, 04:02:47 PMno, it's about 0.0021 BTC. Now the transaction status is showing Confirmed 6 confirmations, still, the problem is showing. I don't understand what to do  Why not import the seed phrase on Electrum and see if you will be able to spend the coin. Electrum official website: https://electrum.orgWhile importing the seed phrase on Electrum, make sure you click on BIP39 and check it ✅Quote from: LoyceMobile on August 16, 2022, 04:30:19 PMIs switching to a better wallet an option?Probably he can import the seed phrase on Electrum and see if the error would still occur or not, a nice idea.

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 16, 2022, 05:00:59 PMQuote from: Crypto Library on August 16, 2022, 04:02:47 PMno, it's about 0.0021 BTC. Now the transaction status is showing Confirmed 6 confirmations, still, the problem is showing. I don't understand what to do  Why not import the seed phrase on Electrum and see if you will be able to spend the coin. Electrum official website: https://electrum.orgWhile importing the seed phrase on Electrum, make sure you click on BIP39 and check it ✅Quote from: LoyceMobile on August 16, 2022, 04:30:19 PMIs switching to a better wallet an option?Probably he can import the seed phrase on Electrum and see if the error would still occur or not, a nice idea.Thanks for the suggestion mate. Transactions successfully done . Once again got help from the forum ,Thanks to all. I should lock this thread
